mapper.select: select bm.book_name, bm.book_author, bm.category, bm.location, bm.isbn_number, bm.amount, sum(b.available) as available_number from book_meta bm left join book b on b.isbn_number = bm.isbn_number where bm.isbn_number = #{isbnNumber}
select * from book_meta where isbn_code like concat(concat('%', #{isbnCode}), '%')
